sentences.sentence: Don't diddle code to make it faster—find a better algorithm.
sentences.translation: 不要为了使代码更快而胡乱编写代码——要找到更好的算法。

sentences.sentence: They'll diddle you out of your last penny if you give them the chance.
sentences.translation: 如果你给他们机会，他们就会把你骗得一分不剩。

sentences.sentence: We live in a world in which people diddle on their phones while playing with their kids.
sentences.translation: 我们生活在这样一个世界里，人们一边和孩子玩，一边玩手机。
